name: part_002
file: tmp_【 3DLIVE 】#アキロゼ生誕祭2026 ーLife is GAMEー【ホロライブ⧸アキ・ローゼンタール】 [_tBlI-l8WLk]_gemini-3-pro-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Aki Rosenthal performing the song 'Deal with the devil' on a casino-themed stage with backup dancers.
MC section. Aki talks to the audience, introduces the birthday live, and interacts with a roulette wheel.

subtitles.original: Ah, oh my god.
subtitles.english: Ah, oh my god.

subtitles.original: 仕掛けて罠にハメるわ
subtitles.english: I'll set a trap and snare you in it.

subtitles.original: 油断誘うのよ
subtitles.english: Inviting you to let your guard down.

subtitles.original: 思考を止めて楽しめ
subtitles.english: Stop thinking and just enjoy it.

subtitles.original: 何も知らないような顔で
subtitles.english: With a face like you know nothing,

subtitles.original: 落とすわあなたを
subtitles.english: I will bring you down.

subtitles.original: どうせ明日は予定調和のつまらない日々
subtitles.english: Tomorrow is just another boring day of pre-established harmony anyway.

subtitles.original: でもだって変に重ねない
subtitles.english: But even so, I won't play it safe,

subtitles.original: どんな小さなズルだって
subtitles.english: Even the smallest cheat,

subtitles.original: アタシの目は誤魔化されないわ
subtitles.english: My eyes won't be fooled.

subtitles.original: I'm beginning of the race
subtitles.english: I'm beginning of the race

subtitles.original: 相手するなら覚悟決めて
subtitles.english: If you're going to take me on, be prepared.

subtitles.original: 粛清してあげる
subtitles.english: I'll purge you.

subtitles.original: 狙った獲物は逃さない
subtitles.english: I won't let my targeted prey escape.

subtitles.original: 唇濡らして
subtitles.english: Wet your lips,

subtitles.original: いただくわ全て
subtitles.english: I'll take everything.

subtitles.original: ダイヤのジャックで手が揃うわ
subtitles.english: With the Jack of Diamonds, my hand is complete.

subtitles.original: 笑みは殺し始末だけ
subtitles.english: Kill the smile, it's just the end.

subtitles.original: アタシのポーカーフェイスは It's perfect
subtitles.english: My poker face is It's perfect.

subtitles.original: 一部の隙も見せたりしないわ
subtitles.english: I won't show even a single gap.

subtitles.original: 視線感じて
subtitles.english: Feeling the gaze,

subtitles.original: お望みなら最後まで
subtitles.english: If you wish, until the very end.

subtitles.original: 見てばかりいないでアタシが教えてあげる
subtitles.english: Don't just watch, I'll teach you.

subtitles.original: 負けるのが怖いの？ Risk?
subtitles.english: Are you afraid of losing? The risk?

subtitles.original: 夢消えた列車だ
subtitles.english: It's a train where dreams vanished.

subtitles.original: 手を取って変に透かして
subtitles.english: Take my hand and act all coy,

subtitles.original: アタシのものにする
subtitles.english: I'll make it mine.

subtitles.original: あなたの髪の一本まで全部
subtitles.english: Every single strand of your hair, all of it.

subtitles.original: I'm beginning of the race
subtitles.english: I'm beginning of the race

subtitles.original: 震え待ってるのよ Oh yeah
subtitles.english: Trembling and waiting, oh yeah.

subtitles.original: 行くところまで行くわ
subtitles.english: I'll go as far as I can go.

subtitles.original: Dealを取って 捨て身の Bluff
subtitles.english: Take the deal, a desperate bluff.

subtitles.original: 躊躇わない 恐れない
subtitles.english: I won't hesitate, I won't fear.

subtitles.original: 誰にも触らせないこの Money
subtitles.english: I won't let anyone touch this money.

subtitles.original: I'm beginning of the race
subtitles.english: I'm beginning of the race

subtitles.original: 覚悟決めて
subtitles.english: Make up your mind.

subtitles.original: 灰になるまで撃って
subtitles.english: Shoot until it turns to ash.

subtitles.original: 弾けるようじゃね まだ Baby
subtitles.english: If you're popping off, you're still a baby.

subtitles.original: 誰にも負けない感じさせて Love me Honey
subtitles.english: Make me feel like I won't lose to anyone... Love me Honey.

subtitles.original: おっと…あれ？椅子…なくなっちゃった
subtitles.english: Oops... huh? The chair... is gone.

subtitles.original: もう少し座らせて欲しかった…
subtitles.english: I wanted to sit a little longer...

subtitles.original: はーい みんな！
subtitles.english: Hiii, everyone!

subtitles.original: 見えてる？聞こえてる？
subtitles.english: Can you see me? Can you hear me?

subtitles.original: ホロライブ所属の癒し系ハーフエルフ
subtitles.english: Hololive's healing half-elf,

subtitles.original: アキロゼこと アキ・ローゼンタールです！
subtitles.english: AkiRose, aka Aki Rosenthal!

subtitles.original: ハロハロハロー！アローナ！
subtitles.english: Hallo hallo hallo! Alona!

subtitles.original: えー 今回の #アキロゼ生誕祭2026 へ
subtitles.english: Um, to this AkiRose Birthday Festival 2026...

subtitles.original: ようこそ！
subtitles.english: Welcome!

subtitles.original: 早速ね なんか色々行われていたんですが
subtitles.english: Things were happening right from the start, but...

subtitles.original: 一体今回のライブはどうなっちゃうのか
subtitles.english: I wonder what on earth will happen in this live...

subtitles.original: ぜひ 最後まで必見！
subtitles.english: Please, it's a must-watch until the end!

subtitles.original: お見逃しなく お願いします
subtitles.english: Don't miss it, please.

subtitles.original: 今回のライブのハッシュタグは
subtitles.english: The hashtag for this live is...

subtitles.original: #アキロゼ生誕祭2026
subtitles.english: #AkiRoseBirthdayFestival2026

subtitles.original: こちらをつけて Xに沢山ポストしてね
subtitles.english: Use this and post lots on X, okay?

subtitles.original: もちろん可愛い…スクショ！
subtitles.english: Of course, cute... screenshots!

subtitles.original: アハーン
subtitles.english: Ahaan~

subtitles.original: えー 沢山撮って 合わせて投稿してください
subtitles.english: Um, please take lots and post them together.

subtitles.original: ライブが終わったあと アキロゼ見に行きます
subtitles.english: After the live ends, AkiRose will go look at them.

subtitles.original: 見てね
subtitles.english: Watch me, okay?

subtitles.original: あ チャンネル登録もよろしくね！
subtitles.english: Ah, please subscribe to the channel too!

subtitles.original: オッケー？ 曲行って？ はい ありがと
subtitles.english: Okay? Go to the song? Yes, thanks.

subtitles.original: ほっ ん？なんだ？何なにナニ？
subtitles.english: Ho. Hm? What is it? What what what?

subtitles.original: え？うおーん…
subtitles.english: Eh? Whoa...

subtitles.original: ていうか ここ どこなんだろう？
subtitles.english: By the way, where is this place?

subtitles.original: お？あんなとこにルーレットがある
subtitles.english: Oh? There's a roulette over there.

subtitles.original: え 回るのかな？
subtitles.english: Eh, I wonder if it spins?

subtitles.original: おっ え！回った！えー すごい！回った！
subtitles.english: Oh, eh! It spun! Eh, amazing! It spun!
